oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Allied-Axis Position in the Near East - Autumn 1941
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A map published in the 1941 AUC publication "What is Going on in the Near East" depiciting the military situation in North Africa in Autumn of 1941.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945 -- Campaigns -- Africa, North; World War, 1939-1945 -- Middle East
